name: Quantum Brix
description:
Rotate the base to match with the falling puzzles. WebGL game – no Flash/Unity WebPlayer plugin required. Your game stats will be saved in browser.

Welcome to your First Job in space. Being employee at Quantum Brix, it's your duty to rotate the ground puzzle to match with the incoming top puzzle. If you master the game with combos and soaring puzzles, you can buy new game modes and upgrades.

Features

  • simple controls: swipe left/right to rotate base, swipe down to speed up
  • various game modes and classes for lasting enjoyment
  • supports all gamepads
  • in-game currency: earn money, invest in new game modes and upgrades
  • master the combo system, reach high levels and maximise your profit

This game is currently in beta state. We are working on new game modes and features and we will update Quantum Brix regularly.

Please tell us what you think of QUANTUM BRIX!
